name: Come Together (MaxJune)
description:
Come Together is a game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.
We are 5 french students in Game and Animation and this is our first Game Jam !

This game is a 2D plateformer where you have to form your music group by gathering your teammates and their instruments  in order to get on the stage ! You also have the choice between 3 styles of music.

All the musics, sounds, animations and illustrations such as the background, characters and instruments were made by our team. 

Have a good game and thanks for playing :)
